info.title: Bump into the top edge of a modal dialog

raw.name: VoiceOver for macOS
raw.defaultConfigurationInstructionsHTML: Configure VoiceOver with default settings. For help, read <a href="https://github.com/w3c/aria-at/wiki/Configuring-Screen-Readers-for-Testing">Configuring Screen Readers for Testing</a>.

instructions: If VoiceOver said 'quick nav off', press <kbd>Left Arrow</kbd> and <kbd>Right Arrow</kbd> again to turn it back on.
If VoiceOver said 'quick nav on', press <kbd>Left Arrow</kbd> and <kbd>Right Arrow</kbd> again to turn it back off.
If VoiceOver said 'arrow quick key nav off', press <kbd>Left Arrow</kbd> and <kbd>Right Arrow</kbd> again to turn it back on.
If VoiceOver said 'arrow quick key nav on', press <kbd>Left Arrow</kbd> and <kbd>Right Arrow</kbd> again to turn it back off.
If VoiceOver said 'single quick key nav off', press <kbd>Control</kbd>+<kbd>Option</kbd>+<kbd>q</kbd> again to turn it back on.
If VoiceOver said 'single quick key nav on', press <kbd>Control</kbd>+<kbd>Option</kbd>+<kbd>q</kbd> again to turn it back off.

setupScript.scriptDescription: opens the 'Add Delivery Address' modal dialog, and sets focus on the 'Add Delivery Adress' heading
setupScript.name: openAddDeliveryAddressDialogAndFocusAddDeliveryAddressHeading

instructions.instructions: Starting at the 'Add Delivery Address' heading inside the dialog, make multiple attempts to navigate past the top edge

defaultMode: Configure VoiceOver with default settings. For help, read <a href="https://github.com/w3c/aria-at/wiki/Configuring-Screen-Readers-for-Testing">Configuring Screen Readers for Testing</a>.

commands.keystroke: Control+Option+Left Arrow then Control+Option+Left Arrow then Control+Option+F3

assertions.assertionStatement: Screen reader cursor is positioned at heading 'Add Delivery Address'
assertions.assertionPhrase: position screen reader cursor at heading 'Add Delivery Address'

tokenizedAssertionStatements.jaws: The virtual cursor is positioned at heading 'Add Delivery Address'
tokenizedAssertionStatements.nvda: The browse mode caret is positioned at heading 'Add Delivery Address'
tokenizedAssertionStatements.voiceover_macos: The VoiceOver cursor is positioned at heading 'Add Delivery Address'

tokenizedAssertionPhrases.jaws: position the virtual cursor at heading 'Add Delivery Address'
tokenizedAssertionPhrases.nvda: position the browse mode caret at heading 'Add Delivery Address'
tokenizedAssertionPhrases.voiceover_macos: position the VoiceOver cursor at heading 'Add Delivery Address'
